document.full_text: mississippi lawmakers on monday voted to build a civil rights museum, a project pushed by governor haley barbour amid criticism that he was doing so to help a possible presidential campaign.
document.title: mississippi lawmakers approve new civil rights museum
lines_and_colors: mississippi lawmakers on monday voted to build a civil rights museum, a project pushed by governor haley barbour amid criticism that he was doing so to help a possible presidential campaign.
